p: Human coronavirus strain 229E (HuCoV-229E) can remain infectious on inanimate surfaces at RT from 2 h to 9 d on different types of materials[ 33] (Table 1). At 21 Â°C and RH of 30-40%, inoculums of 10 3 plaque-forming units (PFU) of HuCoV-229E persisted on polyfluorotetraethylene (Teflon), polyvinyl chloride (PVC), ceramic tiles, glass, and stainless steel for at least 5 d, as well as on silicon rubber for 3 d.
